name: Getting Old
description:
This game was made for LD50 Game Jam

Getting Old

How long can you evade getting old and eventually dying?

I made this game with my wife and my friend.

I did the coding part, my wife did the 2D and my friend worked on the 3D environment.

Use WASD to move and left-click to shoot!

You can drop stuff by killing reapers who try to age you!
